
# GUI Introduction

## Mainwindow

![01_mainwindow](./_image/01_mainwindow.png)

### Menu Bar
1. 選單File:
    - New File
    - Open File
    - Save File
    - Import File

### Setting DockWidget
預設在左邊的側邊視窗，可切換畫布區域(Canvas Layout)的模式。
- Main Layout: 單一畫布
- Up and Down Layout: 上下兩個畫布。



<div class='columns'>
<div class="column-item">

![00_pending](./_image/00_pending.png)

</div>
<div class="column-item">

![00_pending](./_image/00_pending.png)

</div>
</div>
